special_abilities.name: Grim Harvest.
descriptions: Once per turn when Oreioth kills one or more creatures with a spell of 1st level or higher, he regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Oreioth is a 6th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: * Cantrips (at will): chill touch, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
descriptions.hyperlinked: * Cantrips (at will): chill touch, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp

descriptions.raw: * 1st level (4 slots): false life, mage armor, magic missile, ray of sickness
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 1st level (4 slots): false life, mage armor, magic missile, ray of sickness

descriptions.raw: * 2nd level (3 slots): crown of madness, misty step
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 2nd level (3 slots): crown of madness, misty step

descriptions.raw: * 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, vampiric touch
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, vampiric touch

special_abilities.name: Swift Animation (Recharges after a Long Rest).
descriptions: When a living Medium or Small humanoid within 30 feet of Oreioth dies, he can use an action on his next turn to cast animate dead on that humanoid's corpse, instead of using the spell's normal casting time.

actions.name: Dagger.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.
